title: Order Management Mastery: Click to Doorstep Excellence
author: Ekobol Operations Team
image_alt: Advanced logistics command center with real-time order tracking
image_caption: Processing 10,000 orders is as easy as processing 1.
p1: An order isn't just a sale—it's a promise to your customer. Ekobol's Order Command Center gives you military-grade control with automation rules, bulk fulfillment, returns management, and carrier integrations to ensure every promise is kept.
p2: Understanding the 6 order states is critical for automation.
meaning_pending: Customer clicked buy, bank hasn't confirmed
p3: Handle high-value or custom orders individually.
li3_text: Select carrier (DHL, FedEx, MNG, Aras, Yurtiçi Kargo)
li7_text: Customer receives auto-notification with tracking link
p4: Process hundreds of orders in minutes.
li11_text: Generates single PDF with all shipping labels, sorted by SKU or destination.
li12_text: If using Ekobol Logistics, tracking numbers assigned automatically (1000 orders/minute).
li13_text: Upload CSV with Order ID + Tracking Number for bulk update.
li14_text: Rule: IF order value <$20 AND payment confirmed → Auto-ship via cheapest carrier
li15_text: Rule: IF product = 'Digital Download' → Auto-send email with file link
li16_text: Rule: IF destination = 'International' → Hold for customs docs review
li17_text: Rule: IF payment pending >48 hours → Auto-cancel order
li18_text: Rule: IF address validation fails → Email customer, hold order
li19_text: Customer initiates return via marketplace or Ekobol portal
li20_text: You review reason (Defective, Wrong Size, Changed Mind)
li23_text: Item usable but damaged? Offer 30% refund, customer keeps product.
li24_text: Auto-create new order for replacement size/color.
li25_text: Issue credit instead of refund to encourage repeat purchase.
tip_text: For items <$15, auto-approve returns without requiring product return. Shipping cost > product cost. Customer keeps item, gets refund, becomes loyal.
p7: Prevent failed deliveries before they happen.
li26_text: AI validates addresses against postal databases
li27_text: Flags typos, missing apartment numbers, invalid zip codes
li29_text: Customer auto-notified to confirm corrected address
li30_text: Turkey: MNG Kargo, Aras Kargo, Yurtiçi Kargo, PTT, Sürat Kargo
li33_text: Real-time status updates via carrier webhooks
li34_text: Customer tracking page (branded with your logo)
p9: Handle problems fast to protect seller rating.
li36_text: Flag order as 'Investigation'. Auto-file claim with carrier (if insured).
li37_text: Carrier holds at pickup point. Auto-notify customer with pickup address.
li38_text: Request photos, approve return/replacement, claim insurance.
li39_text: Fulfillment Speed: Average time from order to shipment (target: <24h)
li40_text: Carrier Performance: On-time delivery rate by carrier
li41_text: Return Rate: % of orders returned by product/category
li42_text: Shipping Cost: Average cost per order by destination
li43_text: ✅ Ship within 24 hours to maximize marketplace ranking
li44_text: ✅ Use automation rules for orders <$50 (80% of volume)
li45_text: ✅ Offer free returns on high-margin products (builds trust)
li47_text: ✅ Monitor return reasons monthly, fix root cause (sizing chart, better photos)
p11: Operational excellence separates good sellers from great ones. Master these workflows to scale without chaos.
